properties.name: Greetings from Lea in Kokkola! Welcome to the North!
properties.description: Posted by Clil Kokkolantie 105, 68500 Kruunupyy, FinlandLea Hopkins, Teacher of RE and Philosophy Länsipuisto Comprehensive School + KYL (upper secondary school), Kokkola, Finland Home address: Karlebyvägen 105, 68500 Kronoby, Finland (in Swedish, used locally) = Kokkolantie 105, 68500 Kruunupyy (in Finnish, used elsewhere) Tel. +358-50-5548340 Email lea.hopkins@kokkola.fi CLIL experience: RE + English History to English immersion students grades 7 to 9 (ages 13 to 16) from the year 2000 and RE to Swedish immersion students grades 7 to 9 from the year 2007. Finnish coordinator of our school CLIL Comenius project "CLIL Methodology and Renewable Energy Sources" 2007-2009.
